A classic blast from the glorious past ! German thrash metal legends
Kreator offer up the rare &#039;At The Pulse Of Kapitulation - Live in East
Berlin 1990&#039; for the very first time on DVD. Upgraded to a 5.1 mix via
producer Andy Sneap and loaded with bonus footage, this is truly a
dream come true for Kreator fans. In the words of band leader Mille Petrozza:
"Words don&#039;t do justice to the energy that was in the air that day in
East Berlin, and the whole event can only be described as utterly unique
and historic."

1. Some Pain Will Last
2. Extreme Aggression
3. Under The Guillotine
4. Toxic Trace
5. Bringer Of Torture
6. Pleasure To Kill
7. Flag Of Hate
8. Drum Solo
9. Terrible Certainty
10. Riot Of Violence
11. Love Us Or Hate Us
12. Behind The Mirror
13. Betrayer
14. Awakening Of The Gods
15. Tormentor
